page.title: 02Stock
page.content: Stock was known for Brick making and Well lane was called the Chase.Stock has its own Primary school its own village shops and its got three Churches,Roman Catholic,Anglican,Free Church'es.The people do most of their shopping in Stock although some go to South woodham ferrers to the Hypermarket.There are lots of meadows. There are many clubs which include Art club,over 60s,Royal British Legion Stock and Buttsburry Bowling club,Horticultural Society, Mill Camera Club,New Mothers Group,Play Group,Toddlers Club,Music Society,Drama Club,Cricket Club and Womens Institute.One of Stock's famous landmarks is the windmill after which Mill Road is named.The mill is no longer working but is the only one left of three which used to be on Stock Common.
